OrgName.entry: COMMUNITY PAEDIATRICS, SHEFFIELD CHILDRENS NHS TRUST

Desc.entry: Part of the Sheffield Childrens NHS Trust. Specialist clinics include community paediatric out-patient clinic, developmental assessment clinics, enuresis clinics and services to special schools. Referrals by GP or health professionals. Self referral for continence service.

DisabledAccess.entry: Access via several steps with railings, Lifts - external and internal
